title: Python Basics Tutorial
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming
starter:
# Python Basics Tutorial
# Let's start with variables and basic data types

name = "Alice"
age = 25
height = 5.6

print(f"Name: {name}")
print(f"Age: {age}")
print(f"Height: {height} feet")

# Try modifying the values above and run the code!
instructions: Welcome to Python Basics! This tutorial will teach you fundamental Python concepts. Start by running the code to see how variables work, then try modifying the values and experimenting with different data types.
